AnsibleWorks is the company behind the Ansible automation platform (github.com/ansible/ansible). http://ansibleworks.com

We are hiring for backend API (lots of Python/Django/other-bits), UI/UX (we use lots of Angular), and for folks to work on the core OSS project (we use Python).

More details here: http://www.ansibleworks.com/careers/.

Durham, NC, USA
